entry.title: Hard to imagine Karabakh‚Äôs future without Russia, says Karabakh president

media:group.media:title: Hard to imagine Karabakh‚Äôs future without Russia, says Karabakh president
media:group.media:description:
Karabakh President Arayik Harutyunyan reiterated his administration‚Äôs commitment to the region‚Äôs ‚Äúde facto independence,‚Äù while also expressing Stepanakert‚Äôs openness to holding direct talks with Baku. Armenian Foreign Minister Ararat Mirzoyan called on Baku and Ankara to enter into more ‚Äúconstructive‚Äù negotiations with Yerevan at a press conference Thursday alongside his Iranian counterpart. The two foreign ministers then went to Kapan to open Iran‚Äôs new consulate there.
Armenia‚Äôs Defense Ministry denied reports that Armenian forces in the eastern Gegharkunik region opened fire in the direction of an Azerbaijani vehicle.
Source: Ruptly

entry.title: Armenia may be interested in extending EU border mission mandate, says Pashinyan

media:group.media:title: Armenia may be interested in extending EU border mission mandate, says Pashinyan
media:group.media:description:
The Organization for Security and Co-operation in Europe announced it would dispatch a ‚Äúneeds assessment team‚Äù to the Armenian side of the border with Azerbaijan.
Armenian and Iranian Foreign Ministers Ararat Mirzoyan and Hossein Amir Abdollahian will attend the opening of Iran‚Äôs new consulate in Kapan in Armenia‚Äôs southern Syunik region. Billionaire businessman Ruben Vardanyan has accepted an appointment to the post of Karabakh state minister, akin to prime minister.

media:group.media:title: The Russian-European jostle around Armenia
media:group.media:description:
In the latest edition of Insights With Eric Hacopian, Eric talks about some of French President Emmanuel Macron‚Äôs comments about Russia‚Äôs role in the Armenia-Azerbaijan conflict. Eric also discusses Human Rights Watch‚Äôs recent report about Azerbaijani war crimes against Armenian POWs, as well as the EU civilian mission that has been sent to the Armenia-Azerbaijan border.
